data.reasoning: The provided data is extremely limited, consisting only of basic contact information and hours of operation. There is no menu detail, no mention of gluten-free protocols, and no customer reviews discussing allergen handling. In the context of celiac disease, the absence of information about potential gluten sources (like soy sauce, noodles, flour in curry pastes/thickeners) and cross-contact procedures necessitates a conservative high-risk score (low safety score).
risk_factors: No menu information provided to identify inherent gluten sources (e.g., soy sauce, wheat noodles, flour).
No information regarding dedicated gluten-free preparation areas, fryers, or utensils.
Lack of staff training or communication protocols regarding celiac disease is unverified.
High probability of cross-contact due to shared equipment in a typical Thai kitchen environment.
safe_alternatives: No safe alternatives can be identified without menu details.
